This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was letting my dogs out in the yard during the 2nd intermission of the Pens game 1 when I notice a light slowly moving over my tree line than a 2nd light they are flying in formation than a third watching it move slowly I realize this thing was huge and this was a ufo,I ran upstairs to get my camcorder and got a few seconds of this very large ufo,it seem to disappear behind clouds and for a second I saws a what seem to be smaller light fly near but very fast
Summary: letting my dogs out in the yard during the 2nd intermission the pens is when I saw it and holy crap thats a ufo ran to get my camcorder
